<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Goliath Spider](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3209)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Goliath spiders dwell in the deepest jungles, where they build webs as big as temples and feast on prey as large as hippopotamuses.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Goliath_Spider.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Goliath Spider](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3209)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 321 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), web sense

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +22

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +5

**Con** +7

**Int** -5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -4
</row>

**Web Sense** The spider has [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=82) to detect the vibrations of creatures touching its web.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 30 

**Fort** +25 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +17 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 220

</row>

**Spring Upon Prey** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Requirements** Initiative has not yet been rolled; **Trigger** A creature touches the goliath spider's web while the spider is on it; **Effect** The goliath spider automatically notices the creature and Strides, Climbs, or Descends on a Web before it rolls initiative.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 45 feet, climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +24 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+12 piercing plus goliath spider venom

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
web +22 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** web tether

**Descend on a Web** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The goliath spider moves straight down up to 120 feet, suspended by a web line. It can hang from the web or drop off. The distance it Descends on a Web doesn't count for [falling damage](/Rules.aspx?ID=402). A creature that successfully Strikes the web (AC 20, Hardness 5, 20 HP) severs it, causing the spider to fall.

**Goliath Spider Venom**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 30 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 3d6 poison damage and **slowed 1** (1 round); **Stage 2** 3d8 poison damage and slowed 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 3d10 poison damage and [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85) for 2d4 hours

**Web Tether**   A creature hit by the spider's web Strike is [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90) and tethered to the spider, preventing it from being moved farther away from the spider. The spider can have one creature tethered at a time. The DC to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296) or [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=2375) the web is 30. The tether can be severed with a Strike (AC 20, Hardness 5, HP 20), but this doesn't free the restrained creature.

</column>

name: Goliath Spider
